heroSubtitle: Start your career with us! Practical training with master hairdresser instruction
introParagraph1: Color Me Crazy is an official dual training partner for Szegedi SZC Móravárosi Technical and Vocational School. We welcome students from Csongrád-Csanád county who are serious about the hairdressing profession and want to learn the basics in a friendly, professional environment.
introParagraph2: Here you don't just learn – you gain real salon experience, work with modern tools, and prepare for successful professional certification.
benefit1Description: Felicia, a master hairdresser, personally teaches every student
benefit2Description: We provide everything and help you select your own tools
benefit3Description: Introduction to Matrix, Echosline, Pulpriot, Keune, Joico products and their active ingredients
benefit4Description: You start with mannequin heads, then work with real clients
benefit5Description: We teach you how to build your portfolio and find models – preparing you for real professional life
benefit6Description: We support you in finding employment after successful certification
detail2Description: 1 week of practice at the salon, 1 week at school – according to the school's schedule
detail3Description: Shaving, haircuts, coloring, highlights, perming, updos – we prepare you for every exam task
applicationParagraph1: We select candidates based on a personal interview. What we expect: motivation, respect for the profession, and a 5-year plan that we can build on together.
applicationParagraph2: If you feel this is right for you and you're ready for serious work, get in touch with us!
ctaTitle: Ready to become a professional hairdresser?
ctaText: Apply now and start your career with us! We look forward to welcoming you to the Color Me Crazy team.
